message: Dependencies not yet complete. Analyzed existing portal structure and ready to begin implementation once astro-setup, vue-components, and vue-composables complete.

dependencies.astro-setup: incomplete - no pages directory exists yet
dependencies.vue-components: partial - only 6/12 UI components created (Button, Card, Input, Select, Badge, Toggle)
dependencies.vue-composables: incomplete - no composables directory exists yet

existing_portal_structure.styling: Tailwind CSS with dark theme (zinc palette)
existing_portal_structure.patterns: Vue 3 Composition API, TypeScript, computed classes

requirements_understood.dashboards: 10+ categories with individual pages and dynamic [id].astro route
requirements_understood.logs: Advanced viewer with filtering (level, category, date range), export capability
requirements_understood.components: 6 Vue components for grids, viewers, lists, generators, filters
